metadata.title: CVE-2024-39844 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In ZNC before 1.9.1, remote code execution can occur in modtcl via a KICK.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-39844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

znc - 1.7.5-4ubuntu0.1~esm2
znc-perl - 1.7.5-4ubuntu0.1~esm2
znc-python - 1.7.5-4ubuntu0.1~esm2
znc-tcl - 1.7.5-4ubuntu0.1~esm2
znc-backlog - 0.20180824+1.7.5-4ubuntu0.1~esm2
znc-push - 1.0.0+git20190521.78d0385+1.7.5-4ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: znc package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.7.5-4ubuntu0.1~esm2').
